content: so this is what you call a personal website, huh

anyway, welcome to the wonderful world of notsuu.github.io where we will together explore... nothing. this site is just... empty, ive yet to fill it up with something, be it blog posts or just random stuff

the reason for this website? no particular one. the thought to make it just popped up in my head during my (unsuccessful) attempt to fall asleep, so naturally i procrastinated for the whole day and realized i wanted to make the website at like 11pm
either way, the design is not final, it mostly resembles my old carrd so i might change stuff here and there
until then, see you in the next blog post... i hope
